Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class ResizeNearestNeighbor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.ResizeNearestNeighbor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class ResizeNearestNeighbor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Resize image using nearest neighbor algorithm. The class implements image resizing filter using nearest neighbor algorithm, which does not assume any interpolation.
